Author: qiwoman2
Title: ZEBI CHAIN: Blockchaining India’s Big Data
Body: ZEBI CHAIN ANNOUNCEMENT THREAD  WHITEPAPER: https://www.zebi.io/assets/wp.pdf TELEGRAM: https://web.telegram.org/#/im?p=@ZebiData TWITTER: https://twitter.com/ZebidataIndia     About Us Zebi is a young and innovative organization founded, mentored and managed by Oxford, MIT, Stanford, and IIT veterans and thought leaders from Silicon Valley with experience in Google, Uber, Amazon, Microsoft, and Oracle. Zebi specializes in providing Blockchain based offerings to governments and enterprises to leverage and protect their high value and sensitive data.  India’s big data generation is increasing exponentially and is expected to reach 3 Zebibytes per year (Zebibyte = 1024^7 bytes) by 2020, driven by continued growth of internet usage, social networks, proliferation of smartphones, as well as the digital initiatives and structural reforms undertaken by the government. At the same time, incidents of data crimes such as data hacks, data leaks, data tampering, identity thefts are on the rise, which are costing Indian organizations and consumers more than $30 billion annually.  Zebi specializes in providing blockchain based solutions to governments and enterprises to leverage and protect their high value and sensitive data. Zebi is one of the few enterprise grade product companies based in India offering best of the expertise of Silicon Valley at Indian prices  Recognizing the need and opportunity to enable with technology the enforcement of data protection regulations, Zebi has created a Blockchain driven, unique and holistic solution to make high value and sensitive data readily available for legitimate use. Zebi safeguards data against hacking and tampering, while obtaining consent from individuals. The solution comprises of Zebi Chain™ to provide immutability to critical records, coupled with a central hub called Zebi Data Gateway which enables secure and instant data exchange through Data-as-a-Service (DaaS) APIs. Zebi’s innovative, proprietary solution set is one of the first in industry and is patent pending.   Zebi’s Blockchain Solution  Reliable & Secure Blockchain Enforced Tamperproof and Hacker-proof   Flexible Minimal intrusive and greater flexibility with respect to private/public blockchain utilization   Technology Enforced Smart contracts and digital signatures enabled data exchange with no human intervention required   Efficient Instant and transparent access to data using DaaS APIs   Data Democracy All sensitive data requests go through explicit and granular consent mechanism   Paperless Exchange Business processes can be fully automated to enable true paperless exchange of information    ZEBI ROADMAP HERE: https://www.zebi.io/#roadmap  Bird’s Eye View of the Solution  Zebi solution ecosystem consists of two interconnected proprietary Components Zebi Chain™ and Zebi Data Gateway, to bring Individuals, Data Providers and Data Requestors on a common platform to enable secure, seamless and consent based exchange of information among them.   Zebi Chain™ is a proprietary light weight satellite application installed at various Data Providers’ premises to provide immutability using Blockchain based ledger. The number of nodes in the private Blockchain is configurable and integrates with Ethereum public Blockchain for 100% tamperproof protection.   Zebi Data Gateway shall connect Zebi Chain™ installations and on-board individuals and data requestors with a simple registration process. It can facilitate instant data exchange through DaaS APIs by connecting to Zebi Chain™ instances and taking individual consent wherever appropriate.   MEET THE TEAM HERE: https://www.zebi.io/#team   ZEBI NEWS HERE: https://www.zebi.io/news.html   WHERE TO BUY ZEBI ON EXCHANGES:  https://idex.market/eth/zco  (currently under maintenance)  https://etherdelta.com/#0x2008e3057bd734e10ad13c9eae45ff132abc1722-ETH  https://forkdelta.github.io/#!/trade/0x2008e3057bd734e10ad13c9eae45ff132abc1722-ETH   MORE ZEBI MARKETS: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/zebi/#markets  Please note I am in no way affiliated with Zebi except as a normal investor in the project.

Author: debext
Title: ZEBI CHAIN: Blockchaining India’s Big Data
Body: I also heard about it, but these are only assumptions. They wrote that they expect profits of $ 60 million by 2022. With today's capitalization, this does not seem like a hundredfold increase. And it's strange that developers do not have an official thread on this forum. Then how did they conduct an advertising campaign?

Author: qiman
Title: ZEBI CHAIN: Blockchaining India’s Big Data
Body: I voted for ZEBI when my Wife told me about it on Twitter and there are apparently around 5 hours to go before voting closes for the OKEX exchange. I am going to read up more on the whitepaper tonight but what I found most interesting that TORQUE, a venture capital company has invested in ZEBI. So for me,a  company like that to invest in ZEBI, means that thorough due diligence was done by that company already, so I have more trust in it. I also purchased around 10k ZEBI on idex exchange but my Wife she went in more heavier than myself.

Author: debext
Title: ZEBI CHAIN: Blockchaining India’s Big Data
Body: The OKEX exchange recently completed the voting. Five projects reached the final and among them there are ZCO. The owners of the exchange with representatives and developers have already contacted via the official communication channel and negotiations are under way. I think they will all be listed, everything will depend on the requirements that will need to be met. If Zebi will be listed this exchange, then it will be the first decentralized exchange, which means that the trading volumes will increase

Author: Kruncha
Title: ZEBI CHAIN: Blockchaining India’s Big Data
Body: India blockchaintechnology market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 58% during 2018-24. Top Players are @ZebidataIndia , Primechain, Krypc, Accubits and IBM, and Ernst & Young.
